author: Nathan Hinze
description: The herbal spicy peppermint and liquorice notes of Fernet Branca dominate this digestif-style tequila laced cocktail.
name: Del Famoso (The Famous)
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
